transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam. Good morning sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Sir abhi available hai aap, main aap baat kar sakte hain?
Executive: Haan ek do minute ruko.
Executive: Okay, maine na aapko lead bheji hui hai abhi whatsapp pe, theek hai? Wo aap dekh rahe honge agar to wo 10 minute pehle ki hai, theek hai? Aur Bangluru aur Karnataka ki hai. To pehle to mujhe kuch cheeze aap se puchni thi ye ki sir aap mujhe ye bataiye ki kaunsi location mein aap deal kar rahe ho? Matlab sirf local karna chah rahe ho ya pura pan India cover kar doge aap?
Customer: Main to inko aap jo bhejiye inhi ko hi kholta hu to wo nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Kya nahi dikh raha hai?
Customer: Ye 10 minute wala nahi dikh raha hai ye do do main inko pehle nahi raha hu matlab jaise system mein khol raha hu to sab ikatthe ho rahe hai purane purane koi 10 minute wale dikh nahi rahe.
Executive: Update nahi ho raha hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ek bari seller wapas open karna jo IndiaMART wala app hai wo open karna main guide karti hu aapko kaise dekhna hai.
Executive: Wo Karnataka ki lead hai, theek hai? To pehle aap mujhe ye bata do ki aap Karnataka mein matlab pura pan India deal kar loge na main kahin ki bhi lead bhejungi agar.
Customer: Bhej dijiye bhej dunga, mera to kya hai par mere hisab se jyada door wale log hai na madam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Main to kahin bhej dunga jyada door wale log mere hisab se wo lenge nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye aisa nahi hai bahut sari companies hain jo pan India mein deal karti hain. Ab meri baat pehle dhyan se suniyega, theek hai? Bahut sari companies jo pura pan India deal karti hain. To wo depend hamare upar karta hai ki hum clients se kaise baat kar rahe hain. Ab agar jaise unka transportation ka charge hota hai aur agar hamara product achcha hai to wo transportation ka charge wo khud bear karte hain. Hai na? To hamara to hame sirf unse sale karni hai aur hum kaise bhi karke unse convince karna hai humko client ko. Hai na? To convince karne ke liye na sir effective call hona bahut jaruri hai. To aap jitna bhi follow kar rahe ho apne client ko wo thoda sa effectively kar dijiyega bas ho jayegi deal aur convert to aapko hi ultimate baat karni padegi. Hai na sir?
Customer: Bhej dunga par koi yahan bhejega kal bheja aapne usko baat hui kya photo bhejo wo to dekh hi nahi raha hai aise kya kare ab.
Executive: Haan aapne mujhe kal wala scene bataya tha to hota hai na sir kuch clients aise hote hain ya fir kisi ki deal agar convert ho gayi to wo deny kar jata hai. Main aapki baat se bilkul sehmat hu aur maine us bare mein bilkul kuch nahi bola. But ye hai ki abhi kya hai recent wali aap lead jaise consumption ke liye bol rahe the ki recent wali us time pe lead nahi dikh rahi thi but abhi dikh rahi hai. Abhi aap recent ka filter lagaoge abhi aapko dikh rahi hai one hour ki one minute ki 10 minute ki.
Customer: Abhi chalu kiya hai to sabse upar to ye aa raha hai Jodhpur ka aa raha hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo India laga ke dekho ye laga ke ye Jodhpur wala aa raha hai 23 September pehle ka.
Executive: Hmm aap ek cheez bataiyega pehle pan India to aap deal kar hi loge. Second cheez na hum pattern pe aate hain ab humne lead ka consumption karna start kar diya hai to ab na aapko follow up achche se karna padega. Main aapko ek bari guide kar deti hu ki kaise follow karna hai aapko aur kaun kaun se IndiaMART ke features aapko use karne hain. Hai na? To maine kai bar notice bhi kiya hai ki aapko wo cheeze thoda sa kam pata hai to abhi aap utna use nahi kar pate usko. To main na aapko ek bar video meet ka link share kar dungi aap please video meet pe aa jaiye hum aapko wahan pe guide kar dete hain ek bari. Theek hai? Aur jahan pe doubt aata hai aap wahan pe fir se ek bari mere se puchh dena ki yahan pe kaise bataya aapne.
Customer: Ab jo aapne bheja wo kyon nahi dikh raha hai?
Executive: Nahi dikh raha hai?
Customer: Wo koi 10 minute ka mere ko koi kahan ka hai Karnataka ka hai.
Executive: Karnataka ka.
Customer: Nahi dikh raha hai dekho maine aapke whatsapp se hi khola hai.
Executive: Haan maine filter laga ke bheja aap filter nahi laga rahe honge na isliye nahi dikh raha hai main aapko bata chuki kaise dekhna hai. Aap ek bari dekhiye apne mail pe ya main aapko whatsapp pe share karti hu aap wahan se link join kariye.
Customer: To ruko madam aadha ghanta abhi to main follow up karunga.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Main bol dunga fir se.
Executive: To aap kitne baje available ho paoge? Abhi matlab main aadhe ghante baad main aapko call karungi to aap available rahoge?
Customer: Ek dedh baje kar do aadhe ek dedh baje.
Executive: Ek dedh baje?
Executive: Abhi sir nahi ho sakta? Matlab aadhe ghante baad agar hum aapko turant bata de to bahut jyada time nahi chahiye.
Customer: Achcha aadha ghanta karta hu main aapko.
Executive: Theek hai ab main na tab tak ke liye aapko kuch leads share kar rahi hu aap wo ek bari dekh lena agar possible ho to warna main aapko filter lagana guide karti hu to wahan se aap filter ek bari lagaiyega theek hai ki samajh mein aaya ki nahi aaya.
Executive: Hai na sir?
Executive: Theek hai aur koi issue to nahi na call vagaira jo aayi hai usme kaisa raha hai?
Customer: Call kitni aati hai bolo kisi se deal hi nahi hui mobile aap se.
Executive: Aapke paas aapke jo aap photo bhej do photo bhejta hu to usme sahi deal hai usme to kya karenge.
Executive: Aur aapke paas mein jo mail mein inquiry receive hoti hai uspe sir baat kiya aapne?
Customer: Sir jis baat koi aayi nahi jab baat kaise kare koi to bol raha hai aapne diya hi nahi jab raha 10 20 logon ko is mahine mein kiya phone to maine.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Koi to bol raha hai hum logon ne.
Executive: Koi nahi sir main aapko na ek bari guide karti hu ki filters kaise karne hain aur kahan se follow karna hai client ko to kuch aur cheeze aapko samajh mein aa jayegi jaise pehle buylead consumption ke liye bataya wo ab wo kafi achcha ja raha hai. Ab usi tarah se ek bari purchase pattern pe aate hain aur kaise follow karte hain wo aaj ek bari fir se ek bar guide kar dete hain wahan se fir business ki baat karenge.
Customer: Haan ji open kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir aadhe ghante baad hum connect karte hain, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to see recent buyleads.

- Customer says distant clients won't buy.

- Customer says no deals are being made.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on IndiaMART features.

- Executive shared a video meet link for guidance.

- Executive will share leads and guide on filters.

- Executive will reconnect in 30 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will reconnect in 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, pan india, filters
